description.list:
Here is a list of all messages that are linked to this form. To edit one of them just click on *go to*, right click on the message and select `Apps` → `Edit this message`.
{0}
description.empty: You can link custom messages to this form using {0}.

pages.title: Form Page ({0}/{1})
pages.description: Below is a list of all your form fields. Use {0} to modify a form field or move it to a different form page.

allowed_roles.name: $shieldunlock$ Allowed Roles
allowed_roles.value:
Members need at least one of these roles to use this form:

{0}

blocked_roles.name: $shieldlock$ Blocked Roles
blocked_roles.value:
Members with any of the following roles **may not** use this form:

{0}

notify_roles.name: $shielduser$ Notify Roles
notify_roles.value:
These roles receive a ping each time a new form is submitted:

{0}

ratelimit.title: Rate Limit
ratelimit.description: Prevent spam or control exactly how many submissions are allowed in a given time period.

forum_channel.title: Forum Channel Settings
forum_channel.description: The settings below are only relevant if your submission channel is a forum channel.

tags.name: $pricetag$ Submission Tags
tags.value:
These tags are automatically added to new form submissions:

{0}

command.title: Form Command
command.description: Use a custom Discord slash command to open your form
command.no_command_exist: To create a command, use the following command: {0}

links.title: Form Links
links.description: Add custom links to your form using {0}.

title_invalid_length.title: Invalid Input
title_invalid_length.description: `title` must be 45 or fewer in length

limit_reached.title: Form limit reached
limit_reached.description: You reached your form limit. You can create up to 25 forms.

created.title: Form created
created.description: Your form has been created successfully.

add_fields.name: Add form fields
add_fields.value: You can add form fields using {0} with `{1}` as form.

auto_create_not_allowed.title: Not Allowed
auto_create_not_allowed.description: To enable automatic creation of private channels, you must first specify a parent using {0}.

channel_must_be_forum.title: Channel must be a forum channel
channel_must_be_forum.description: The configured channel is not a forum channel. Use {0} to set a forum channel as your submission channel.

tag_mismatch.title: Select menu options are not up to date
tag_mismatch.description: There is a mismatch between the options of the select menu and the available tags of <#{0}>. Use this command again to get the latest options.

setup_required.title: Setup Required
setup_required.description: Rate limiting is not configured for this form. Use all three command arguments `enabled`, `amount` and `timespan` to setup rate limiting.

invalid_timespan.title: Invalid Timespan
invalid_timespan.description:
The `timespan` could not be formatted correctly. Please use the following format:

`45s` → *45 seconds*
`2m` → *2 minutes*
`4h` → *4 hours*
`1d` → *1 day*

invalid_amount.title: Invalid Amount
invalid_amount.description: The `amount` field must be a number

not_configured.title: Form not configured
not_configured.description: This form is not configured correctly. Please contact the server administrator.

disabled.title: Form is disabled
disabled.description: This form has been disabled by an administrator. Please contact the server administrator.

missing_access_to_open.title: Missing Access
missing_access_to_open.description: You are not allowed to use this form due to missing permissions.

too_many_submissions.title: Too Many Submissions
too_many_submissions.description: You have submitted this form too many times. Wait some time and try again.

submission.title: New Form Submisison
submission.too_large: This submission is too large to be displayed using Discord embeds. As a result, the files above contain all of the data.
submission.too_large_user: Your submission is too large to be displayed using Discord embeds. As a result, we've included the files above that contain all of your data.

invalid_configuration.title: Invalid Configuration
invalid_configuration.description: The channel for all submissions has been deleted

confirm_submission.title: Confirm your Submission
confirm_submission.description: Take time to review your data. You can edit form fields using the drop-down menu below. When you are done editing, submit your form by clicking Submit.

invalid_length.title: Invalid Input
invalid_length.description: `name` must be 32 or fewer in length

invalid_format.title: Invalid Input
invalid_format.description: `name` is invalid. Use {0} to check your slash command name.

reserved.title: Invalid Input
reserved.description: `{0}` is a reserved name. You cannot use it.

invalid_length.title: Invalid Input
invalid_length.description: `description` must be 100 or fewer in length

draft.title: Draft Found
draft.description: Would you prefer to continue your work on it, or delete the draft and start filling out the form again?

not_a_large_submission.title: Not Allowed
not_a_large_submission.description: You can only use this interaction for form submissions that are too large to be displayed using Discord embeds

not_a_submission.title: Not Allowed
not_a_submission.description: You can only use this interaction on form submissions

select_download_format.title: Download Form Submission
select_download_format.description: In which format would you like to download this form submission?

saved_as_draft.title: Submission saved as Draft
saved_as_draft.description: Your form progress has been saved. When you return, you'll pick up right where you left off.
